advancements.norse_adventure.recipes.roo: All ships are crafted by throwing their required ingredients in a pile on the ground.
advancements.norse_adventure.recipes.kar: 8 Iron Ingots, 32 Oak Planks, 8 Oak Logs & 8 White Wool
advancements.norse_adventure.recipes.kna: 16 Iron Ingots, 64 Oak Planks, 8 Oak Logs & 8 White Wool
advancements.norse_adventure.recipes.ske: 32 Iron Ingots, 64 Oak Planks, 16 Oak Logs & 16 White Wool
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.ka: Craft the Karve, an all-purpose vessel used for fishing, trading and transportation.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.kn: Craft the Knarr, a trading vessel with lots of storage.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.sk: Craft the Skeid, a transport and raiding ship, able to carry a large amount of warriors.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.st: Sit down in the rearmost seat to steer your new ship.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.sa: Accelerate by left/right-clicking the wooden knob to your left.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.ru: Rotate by left/right-clicking the rudder to your right.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.de: Break the ship by attacking the mast
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.sp: Travel at maximum speed in the Skeid.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.he: Fill up a knarr's crates with items.
advancements.norse_adventure.tutorial.co: Catch a cod while sitting in a karve.
